attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned request the return of the crown estate to the monarch IN FULL, to guarantee separation of powers, and to allow such endeavours as present and future monarchs sees fit for the benefit of their people.

Separation of power where one or two powers are supreme is not healthy for a democracy. In light of our constitutional monarchy, we the people desire a greater voice and power for the monarch under the crown, as safety against corrupt executive/legislature and such endeavours at home or abroad which might endanger the long term stability and security of the nation.
